title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing children’s clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated in the book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing children’s clothes in a dream may indicate the loss of worries and a lot of happiness, and God knows best. This vision may also indicate the many misfortunes that befell the pioneer, so he can be saved from them and from the anguish he suffers and alleviate crises. Money. Seeing yourself buying children’s clothes in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will participate in a good and new job and career, and it may also indicate multiple means of earning a livelihood. Interpretation of children’s clothes in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl dreams that she sees children’s clothes in her dream, then this vision It may indicate that the unmarried girl’s worries will be removed soon, and God knows best. Also, seeing children’s clothes in a dream may indicate the happiness that will follow them, abundant livelihood and abundance of money, and God knows best. Also, seeing children’s clothes in a dream may indicate the imminent marriage of the unmarried girl. It may also indicate that she will enter a new job. Seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a single girl may indicate the collapse of her upcoming worries and the achievement of brilliant success and excellence in her life. Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is buying children’s clothes, this indicates On the collapse of her worries, problems, and differences. Also, seeing children’s clothes in a dream can indicate the collapse of all the worries of a married woman and her short pregnancy, which she will be happy with. Also, seeing buying children’s clothes in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of the desires and goals that one seeks to achieve, by God. I know. Seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, and seeing new and small children’s clothes, means that her upcoming affairs will be facilitated and her worries will be removed. Also, seeing children’s clothes in a dream can indicate the ease of their birth and the ease of their birth, as well as the birth of a healthy child from All diseases. Also, the vision of buying children’s clothes may indicate the approaching date of the pregnant woman’s pregnancy and also the end of marital disputes, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of buying children’s clothes for a divorced woman. The interpretation of the vision of buying children’s clothes in a dream for a divorced woman is one of the desired visions that promise her goodness, happiness, and glad tidings. Seeing her For a divorced woman, carrying children’s clothes in a dream is evidence that her troubles have ended and all her conditions have improved, God willing. Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a man: If a gentle man dreams in his sleep that he sees children’s clothes and buys them, this means that the man’s worries and his marriage are about to end. Seeing children’s clothes In a dream, it may indicate the death of worries and sins and the dreamer’s accession to a new job and a high and famous position. Also, seeing children’s clothes in a dream can mean happiness, good news, and happiness, as well as the marriage of good men, and God knows best. Also, seeing children’s clothes in a dream can mean That the dreamer will join a job, a good and new job, a rich diet and money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving children

title: Interpretation of seeing a fishing rod in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a fishing rod in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said about his fishing rod. Fishing in a dream returns a broad and good livelihood. Anyone who sees himself fishing in a dream is a sign of success in study. It also indicates success in business. Seeing a fishing hook cut off symbolizes failure and disappointment. A dream about throwing a fishing rod indicates In the sea to strive and diligently, the dreamer is working hard to achieve his goals. Seeing a big fish being caught with a hook symbolizes great benefit depending on the size of the fish. Seeing the hook being dropped in polluted water symbolizes misfortunes and difficulties. Dreaming of throwing the hook into fresh water indicates hypocrisy and deception of the priest. Meaning of seeing a fishing rod in A dream for a single woman: Seeing and catching a hook in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of success in business. It indicates the imminent realization of aspirations. Seeing a broken hook in an engaged girl’s dream indicates an engagement breakout. Who do you think caught it? A small-sized fish is a sign of marriage to a poor man. Whoever sees the taste of the hook in her dream is a sign of marrying a good and suitable man with whom she will live happily. Anyone who uses the hook for a purpose other than fishing indicates distraction and embarrassment. The meaning of seeing a fishing rod in a dream for a married woman: Seeing her married using a fishing rod and having caught a lot of fish is a sign of good news that she hears. Which they find difficult. Grabbing the hook and using it is an indication of the visionary’s difficulty in shouldering the responsibility he bears. Who I am losing her pole in a dream indicates many problems in the marriage. Seeing her doing the hook with her hand shows that she is good women. Interpretation of seeing a fishing rod in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing yourself holding a pole and chasing it It is a sign of giving birth to a child. Catching a large fish in a dream shows ease of birth. The meaning of seeing a fishing hook in a dream for a man. Seeing a man catching a whale in a dream, the hook is a sign of profit in trade. Whoever throws the hook to no avail announces the dreamer’s routine and lack of importance. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to Marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of snow in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: But what are the signs that indicate that snow takes us in a dream? Its interpretation varies from man to woman, and to know the answer to the previous questions, follow the following topic through our interpreter’s website. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream for one girlSeeing snow in a dream means sustenance and achieving goals And dreams come after fatigue and hardship. Whoever sees a snowman in his dream does not learn from her previous experiences and must submit to God’s will. See also: Interpretation of a single woman’s dream of snowInterpretation of seeing snow in a dream for a married womanSnow in a married woman’s dream expresses the dreamer’s tendency to resolve disputes and marital problems calmly And without the interference of other parties. A woman who feels cold in a dream is a sign of her constant need for her husband. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream for a man and its meaning Snow falling in a dream on the skin of a man who enjoys diet and health. Snow falling in a summer that is not good for her, and symbolizes epidemic and disease. He sleeps on snow in his sleep. He is negligent and he must hasten to repent. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about rain falling inside the house for a single woman. The meaning of seeing snow in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing snow in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates uterine contractions and discomfort during childbirth. This happens if the snow It is large and prevents her from moving in the dream. Crushed snow symbolizes the birth of a girl, God willing. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream for young men and its meaning. Snow in a young man’s dream is the release of worries and the beginning of a new phase full of optimism. The snow falling from the sky is evidence of the answer to the priest’s prayer. And whoever sees me dying and buried in Snow may die from a stray bullet without knowing the reason. You may be interested: Heavy rain in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing snow melting in a dream. Seeing snow melting in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety, the disappearance of sadness, and the beginning of comfort. Melting snow also symbolizes purity and chastity, and everyone who sees snow melting... Plants, an increase in greenery and yield. When he sees someone covered with snow in a dream, he is burdened with worries and burdens, and if the snow melts, his fears will disappear. And whoever sees snow melting on graves, it is a sermon that the dreamer has not learned. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dreamSeeing snow falling in a dream It means an abundance of goodness and livelihood and an increase in agricultural crops, especially with the flow of streams. Whoever sees snow falling on time, it means an increase in goodness and blessings. The sudden fall of snow is evidence of the spread of disease. When the dreamer sees in a dream that snow is falling on him, he may travel to work, But he will face great difficulties in his work. Whoever falls on his body and is struck by a severe cold may lose his money and become poor. Interpretation of seeing yourself walking in the snow in a dream? Seeing yourself walking on the snow easily and without feeling cold means financial gains and a trouble-free living. Seeing yourself walking in the snow Snow in a dream also represents a fickle person who constantly changes his views and thoughts. Walking in the snow also represents things that the dreamer is afraid of losing. Anyone who stands can

title: Interpretation of seeing chains in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing chains in a dream is one of the things that confuses many people who have this dream, because it leaves a trace of fear and panic in their souls, so many people are forced to search websites to find what the chains symbolize in the dream, but the surprise here is that seeing Chains in a dream are a good vision and not unpleasant, and then we will return together to the meanings they symbolize, as interpretations of the vision differ according to the social, material and psychological circumstances of each individual. Read more: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of seeing chains in a dream Interpretation of seeing chains in a dream The great scholar Ibn You will see that seeing chains in a dream is an undesirable vision, contrary to what many people expect. It is also stated that chains in a dream indicate the steadfastness of a Muslim in his religion and the truth, and what God Almighty and His Noble Messenger have commanded him to do. This is based on what our Noble Messenger said: (( (I love chains and hate hatred, for chains are fixed in religion.) As for wheat, it is the chains with which the prisoner is tied, and it is what links the neck, the hands, and the feet. As Ibn Sirin told us, wheat in a dream is disliked and not praised, as it is a symbol of wheat. Humiliation of a person. Therefore, Ibn Sirin tells us that what is restricted in a dream is observance of customs and traditions, which is steadfastness in religion and truth, and steadfastness in the law. It also indicates commitment in general, whether adherence to promises, adherence to deadlines, or commitment to performing tasks and duties. Likewise, Chains in a dream may indicate worries and troubles that will restrict the dreamer, just as being chained indicates that the dreamer is following the whims of Satan. If a believer sees in a dream that he is chained, this is clear and clear evidence of his steadfastness in religion and truth and his obedience to God and His Noble Messenger. And whoever sees that he is chained In a dream in the mosque or one of the walls of the mosque, this indicates that he is committed to performing the five daily prayers at their times regularly and in congregation. Whoever sees himself restricted, this indicates his preoccupation with worldly matters, and ignoring the matters of his religion. Clinging to the dream, according to the interpretation of the great scholar Al-Nabulsi, may indicate the cessation of success, work, and effort. A dream of being chained may also indicate that the dreamer remains the same, because his condition has not changed. Read more: Washing a dead person Interpretation of a dream about joints in a dream Whoever sees himself in a dream that he is chained, this indicates that the dreamer feels sleepy and guilty about something. And if the fortuneteller is found Handcuffed, this indicates that he will enter into litigation in the courts or at the police station. Also, keeping the clips can indicate commitment to a promise that restricts its owner from many things, as well as the responsibility of trust. Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing hands tied in a dream Restriction in general symbolizes Disrupting things and disrupting efforts, as well as disrupting the reconciliation that the dreamer seeks, also indicates that the dreamer will not be able to achieve the goals. Interpretation of seeing the feet tied in a dream: Carrying the feet in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer will face...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a car in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car in a dream Many people have a passion for driving and buying cars and look forward to everything that is in line with developments in the world of cars, and this can be reflected in many of their dreams, so the interpretation can be in the event of their impatience and vision. Passion in the love of cars, and it can be contrary to it, the world remains dreams in the unknown and covered with mystery and mysteries, and in this article we explain the interpretation of a dream about seeing a car in a dream. A dream about seeing a taxi in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation scholars have given opinions on many dreams that people usually have. Among these dreams is Ibn Sirin’s vision of a taxi in a dream through the following signs: If a person sees in his dream that he is driving a car, this is evidence of his hobby in driving a car and may indicate the prosperity and stability he enjoys in his life. If the dreamer sees that he is driving a car with other people in it, the dreamer has secrets and must keep them to himself. Also, if the dreamer drives a car with a woman inside, this is evidence of disclosing something and revealing his secrets. If the dreamer drives a public car in his dream, this is evidence of his inability to achieve his dreams. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and what it indicates The dream of seeing a fire truck in a dream The dream of seeing a fire truck symbolizes the presence of a disaster or a problem that accompanies the dreamer, so through these points we explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing a fire truck in a dream: If a person sees a fire truck in a dream, the vision shows the difficult circumstances that the dreamer is going through, but the end will be beautiful with events that transport humanity, and God knows best. As the scholars of interpretation explained, seeing a damaged fire truck can be a disaster that befalls the dreamer with great losses or a major accident. The scholars of interpretation explained through the books of interpretation that the girl who rides a car Extinguishing in her dream indicates the problems and obstacles that stand in the way of the girl with the vision. See also: Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction in a dream for an unmarried and married woman in Ibn Sirin Seeing a new car in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is one of the imams of hadith, interpretation and vision science. He interpreted many dreams for many people in his time and they were transmitted to us. In these points, we explain the dream of seeing a new car in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Sheikh Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a car in the dreamer's dream is changes that will occur in the dreamer's life in the coming days. Also, seeing a new car in a dream is evidence of the success of the dreamer and perhaps his promotion in his work, and if he is a student, it is his excellence in his studies. However, if the dreamer is poor and sees in his dream that he is driving a new car, this is good, and a lot of sustenance will come to him in the coming days. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a little girl or a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin and what it indicates Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car in a dream and its meaning for a man Dreaming of a car in a dream has many connotations, especially for a man. A man may be exposed to an accident in his dream and remains obsessed with searching for an explanation

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a trip to a foreign country in a complete dream?

preview.html: Trend offers you a complete interpretation of seeing traveling to a foreign country in a dream. You have what is the interpretation of the dream of traveling to America, as we have attached what is the interpretation of the dream of traveling to a foreign country for a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a divorced woman. girl. . This is through the books of leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country to study? The complete interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country is one of visions of psychological and material stability. Also, seeing a person who has traveled to a foreign country to study indicates a better change in his future life. Also, seeing the trip in the dream has been completed, but the dreamer feels upset, this indicates a journey and a journey in crises. Happiness in traveling in a dream is full of visions that indicate that the dreamer will achieve many achievements in his life. Seeing a completely foreign country in a dream indicates the occurrence of... A major change in the dreamer’s circumstances and his entry into a new stage. What is the interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country for an ordinary woman? The interpretation of a dream about traveling in a dream full of public women is one of the praiseworthy visions and an indication of a new life full of happiness. Traveling in a girl’s dream also means the approaching engagement, marriage, and marriage of her husband. In a happy period. Seeing a train trip in a dream for an ordinary woman indicates a life free of problems and continued success. To dream of a girl carrying a heavy bag, intending to travel, indicates fears and problems in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country for a married woman? What is the interpretation Seeing a married woman traveling to a foreign country without her husband, this indicates her success in her work and the satisfaction of her desires. A woman’s journey also shows strength, solidity, and a personality that has prestige and authority among people. If you see yourself traveling with your wife and children in a complete dream, it also means happy, free days. Of trouble. What is the interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman and her child traveling to a foreign country in a complete dream means that she will live a life full of good luck. The complete trip of a pregnant woman in a dream in a foreign country indicates happiness and pleasure in her life and is an indication of The arrival of goodness and livelihood. title: Interpretation of a cafe in a dream A cafe in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the dream of entering a restaurant and ordering coffee and juice and sitting on a chair in a cafe, a dream of a single, married, pregnant woman and a man, according to Ibn Sirin. The symbol of coffee in a dream The cafe in a single girl's dream is a positive symbol because it is a familiar place where a person feels some comfort and confidence. If coffee appears in the dream of an unmarried girl, it expresses the stage of emotional and existential maturity. It means that the girl who sees in her dream that she is sitting with her friends or colleagues in the cafe, has become responsible for her actions. Perhaps the dream of coffee indicates an important position for the girl in her family or work environment The girl who dreams that she is sitting with a strange young man she does not know in the cafe, and that this young man was handsome or elegant. The girl who sees in her dream that she is drinking coffee or tea in the cafe will have something useful Although drinking coffee in a dream is not good, the context is different here because drinking coffee in a familiar and happy atmosphere is a positive symbol and tea and other refreshments, and the best thing that a waiter can offer in a dream is water or milk in addition to coffee, because this is an expression of security, peace and great psychological comfort that the girl can enjoy in the future. The cafe in a dream A married woman: If she sees that she is sitting in a cafe with her husband and children, and she sees that the cafe is a spacious and cheerful place with beautiful lights, then the dream expresses great happiness that fills the woman’s heart and she may be on the verge of an important and happy subject. If a married woman sees that she is sitting in a cafe next to a strange man, and that the man is calm by nature, and his face and appearance are beautiful, then the dream portends good luck knocking on her door in the future. Still optimistic and a very positive symbol A cafe in a pregnant woman's dream If he sees that he is sitting in a luxurious and comfortable cafe, this will be interpreted as comfort during labor or childbirth A cafe in a pregnant woman's dream means the maternity ward if she sees it empty or devoid of customers and clients If she sees the waiter or waitress approaching her, this is her interpretation that the date of birth is near, and the vision in general bodes well as long as the cafe is quiet and there is no hustle or noise. The cafe in the dream of a single and married man It is a physical place as in visions such as the home and the workplace Sometimes it indicates the condition of the good fortune teller if the cafe is luxurious and in an elegant place, and this in turn indicates the deterioration of general conditions and living conditions If the cafe is beloved or full of strangers, or if the viewer hears noise and screaming or obscene conversations, or sees a quarrel and a fight in it, all of this may express a difficult psychological situation that the viewer is going through in his family or at work. It is better to see the owner of the dream as if he is enjoying his time in the cafe watching a football match with his friends or sees that he was discussing an interesting or useful topic with them. It is not good to see The sleeper in his sleep as if he is playing dice or cards in a cafe It is not good to see the owner of the dream as if he is smoking inside the cafe, because this expression is a maze and anxiety. The general atmosphere of the cafe can reflect the psychological or physical state of the viewer Seeing a cafe

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing green beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing green beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Lobia in a dream. Learn more about Mozakat. (Cats in a dream) Interpretation of a dream about green beans in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is eating peas at a different time, this indicates pessimism and bad news that the fortuneteller may hear. Cooked peas in a dream do not have good omens, and the dreamer may hear news of the death of a relative. If the beans are green , it means that the person who sees it will enjoy wealth and money. If it is dry, it means that a cloud of dark fears will cloud his life. Interpretation of a dream about cooking beans with meat. A dream about cooked peas with meat means food and a lot of money for the poor, and meat in a dream means wealth and satisfaction for the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about eating green beansIf the dreamer only eats peas and he is patient On his food despite his reluctance to eat them, this soon means relief and worrying anxiety that you will finally get rid of. Interpretation of a dream about planting beans Planting in a dream has a very positive connotation, as planting beans means a long life and a life full of happiness. Interpretation of a dream about green beans for a married woman Planting beans for a woman For a married woman, it means that her life will be comfortable, but if it is dry, it means that her marital relationship will be tiring and may not last. Interpretation of dreams of green beans for pregnant women, single and married women: Planting in a dream has a very positive connotation, as planting beans means a long life and a life full of happiness. Planting For a married woman, beans mean that her life will be comfortable. If they are dry, it means that her marital relationship will be tired and may not last. Planting peas in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will have a healthy child. As for an unmarried woman, it means that the dreamer will get married and enjoy her life.

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream

preview.html: Lizard in a dream: A lizard is one of the creatures whose sight causes shivers in the souls of individuals, and some of them are extremely afraid of it, and dreaming of it during sleep has the same effect on them, as it makes them want to know what the visions contain. The connotations of words and understanding what they refer to, and in this article a collection of the most important interpretations of scholars who present this topic, let us get to know it. Lizard in a dream. The dreamer’s vision of a lizard in a dream indicates that he is facing many turmoil at that time that greatly hinder him from making any fateful decision. He is decisive, and he should not rush into any new step at that time, otherwise he will suffer dire consequences. A person’s dream of a lizard during his sleep is evidence that there is a person very close to him who shows affection and love, and there is intense hatred and hatred towards him. If the dreamer sees in his dream a lizard eating a butterfly, this is a sign that he will marry an inappropriate woman, who will not help him in obeying God Almighty and will not He is absolutely comfortable in his life with her. It is very malicious and must be careful in its violent movements so as not to get sick. Lizard in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of a lizard in a dream as an indication that he will be exposed to many unpleasant events in his life during the coming period and will enter a state of severe depression as a result, And if a man sees during sleep that he drank the blood of a lizard, this indicates that he is very close to God Almighty and does many good deeds that greatly raise his status with his Creator and protect him with his never-sleeping eye from any harm that may occur. It happens to him. If the dreamer sees a lizard in his dream, this is a sign that there are many around him who mock him and his abilities, and it is better for him to be determined to achieve his goals without paying attention to their ridiculous words. This is to restore him in the face of unexpected changes in his life in the coming period, which will cause him great discomfort. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. A lizard in a dream for a single womanWoman An unmarried woman who sees a lizard in a dream indicates that she is in a relationship with a young man with corrupt morals, and this urges her to commit many heinous acts. She must be strict with him and stay away from him immediately before he causes this. Harmful to the event is that she makes her decisions in her life randomly and without wisdom, and this makes her vulnerable to falling into many problems. If the dreamer sees a lizard in his dream, this means that she will soon face a big problem as a result of a hasty and quick decision without good prior study, and she will not be able to get rid of it. A crisis without the help of one of her relatives, and if a girl sees a lizard in her dream, this symbolizes that she does not calm down much and is always involved in very bad things, but there is someone near her who will save her before any harm comes to her. Her. A lizard in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s vision of a lizard in a dream is an indication of her great desire for that.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of hearing in a dream?

preview.html: Screaming in a dream Humiliation is a manifestation of joy and happiness, and it usually occurs at weddings and weddings, expressing people's happiness. We will explain this in the following lines of the article. Screaming in a dream Jurists mentioned many indications related to the interpretation of the dream of humiliation in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees in a dream that several people are waving inside his house, this is a sign that he has received good news that he has been waiting for for a long time, and if his family does this, it will lead to his illusion. If a person dreams of a group of people chanting in the street, this is a sign of his journey soon. When you dream that you are happy, this symbolizes that you are facing a difficult period in your life. If you see people in a state of mourning, this is a sign of the collapse of worries and sorrows that are rising in the heart of the dreamer. Whoever dreams of him humming at a party or rejoicing, this symbolizes his suffering from a difficult matter soon. Confused and do not find an interpretation that reassures you? Search via Google on the site Secrets of interpreting dreams. Ugliness in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained that saying the dream has many interpretations, the most prominent of which are: If a man sees in a dream that he is in a state of joy and hears a lot of sobbing, this is a sign that he will soon face a problem. The wave in a stranger's dream symbolizes returning from a trip without reaching anything that was intended for him. Watching a person singing while he is asleep for a dead person leads to a good ending and God's satisfaction with this dead person. When a person dreams that his dead grandmother is screaming and feeling very happy, this is an indication of the happy events that await her these days. If a married woman sees during her sleep that her grandmother is happy and she is satisfied with that, the dream proves the end of any dispute with her partner that caused her sadness or misery, as the dream indicates that pregnancy will happen soon. Bad in a single dream Interpretation of a dream of humiliation for an unmarried woman, jurists give it many interpretations, the most prominent of which are the following: If an unmarried girl sees herself screaming in her dream, this is a sign of her upcoming marriage to a righteous young man who will do his best To make her happy and comfortable. If a girl dreams that she is climbing for no specific reason, this leads her to commit a sin or disobedience, and she must repent for it and return to God. Seeing a girl smiling at her wedding symbolizes that she is facing disagreements and problems with her partner or that something bad is happening that makes her feel sad. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is singing in an invisible voice, this is a sign of a crisis or dilemma she is going through, but if a voice appears in her dream, this proves that she is able to deal with this problem and the ability to find a solution to it. Ugly in a dream for a married woman Interpretation of a dream of worship for a married woman is evidence of her bad reputation among people and her gossip about the secrets of her home. If a woman sees in her dream that her husband is chanting, this is a sign of mistreatment by his family, and that they cause a lot of controversy and problems between them. When a married woman dreams that her mother is screaming and happiness fills her faces, this is a sign
